bahasa: Saat ini, saya sedang belajar untuk ujian yang akan datang.

Question: Is the school library being renovated this month?
English: The school library is being renovated this month.
bahasa: Perpustakaan sekolah sedang direnovasi bulan ini.

Question: Will you participate in the debate competition next Friday?
English: I will participate in the debate competition next Friday.
bahasa: Saya akan berpartisipasi dalam kompetisi debat Jumat depan.

Question: Was your lunch accidentally eaten by someone yesterday?
English: My lunch was eaten by someone accidentally yesterday.
bahasa: Makan siang saya dimakan oleh seseorang secara tidak sengaja kemarin.

Question: Do you excel in English compared to your peers?
English: I excel in English compared to my peers.
bahasa: Saya unggul dalam bahasa Inggris dibandingkan dengan teman-teman sebaya.

Question: Have you finished your homework earlier than expected?
English: I have finished my homework earlier than expected.
bahasa: Saya telah menyelesaikan pekerjaan rumah saya lebih awal dari yang diharapkan.

Question: Was a surprise quiz given to the class this morning?
English: A surprise quiz was given to the class this morning.
bahasa: Sebuah kuis mendadak diberikan kepada kelas pagi ini.

Question: Will you present a project at the science fair next month?
English: I will present a project at the science fair next month.
bahasa: Saya akan menyajikan proyek pada pameran sains bulan depan.

English: I often help my classmates with their assignments.
bahasa: Saya sering membantu teman-teman sekelas dengan tugas mereka.

Question: Was your science experiment conducted successfully?
English: My science experiment was conducted successfully.
bahasa: Eksperimen sains saya berhasil dilaksanakan.

Question: Are you attending an art workshop this weekend?
English: I am attending an art workshop this weekend.
bahasa: Saya mengikuti workshop seni akhir pekan ini.

Question: Will the new computer lab be opened next year?
English: The new computer lab will be opened next year.
bahasa: Laboratorium komputer baru akan dibuka tahun depan.

Question: Did you miss the bus, causing you to arrive late at school today?
English: I missed the bus, so I arrived late at school today.
bahasa: Saya melewatkan bus, sehingga saya tiba terlambat di sekolah hari ini.

Question: Will you receive your report card at the end of the month?
English: I will receive my report card at the end of the month.
bahasa: Saya akan menerima kartu rapor saya di akhir bulan.

English: The soccer team practiced diligently for the upcoming match.

English: I forgot to submit my essay on time last week.

Question: Would you join the drama club if you had more free time?
English: I would join the drama club if I had more free time.
bahasa: Saya akan bergabung dengan klub drama jika saya memiliki lebih banyak waktu luang.

English: The school play is being rehearsed for the annual event.
bahasa: Pertunjukan drama sekolah sedang diadakan untuk acara tahunan.

Question: Have you ever been absent from school this semester?
English: I have never been absent from school this semester.

English: I will visit the school museum during the break.

English: The school assembly is usually held every Monday.

English: If it rains tomorrow, the outdoor event will be canceled.

English: My favorite subject is history because it is fascinating.
bahasa: Mata pelajaran favorit saya adalah sejarah karena itu menarik.

English: I always complete my assignments before the deadline.

Question: Do you wish you had more opportunities to join extracurricular activities?

English: I haven't decided on my major for college yet.

English: If I study consistently, I will achieve academic success.

English: If I had known about the holiday, I wouldn't have come to school today.
